engine.translate: двигатель, мотор, машина, паровоз, средство, локомотив, инструмент, орудие
mnemonic:
engine ['ɛndʒɪn]
***
Мне нужен ДВИГАТЕЛЬ, а на обен|джин. (это) engine
Мне нужен МОТОР, а на обен|джин. (это) engine
examples: The engine missed.
The engine won't start.
Gun the engine!
The engine has burned out.
He got into the driving seat and started the engine.
The engine works with labour.
The engine failed unexpectedly.
Wait! Don't start the engine yet.
He bent low over the engine.
Jane kept the engine running.
I stripped down the engine completely.
The engine burst into flame.
The engine's not quite right.
Is the engine running smoothly?
The engine will need to be completely checked.
The car has a four-cylinder engine.
This engine has got only three moving parts.
The job of repairing the engine took several hours.
Rome's deadly war engine
The engine juddered to life.
the moan of the car's engine
an exploded view of an engine
The engine thrummed into life.
the car engine was running at idle
Joe pulled in and killed the engine.
He is a natural with any kind of engine.
a car with a snappy engine
The engine abruptly cut out.
the soft purr of a car engine
The old engine was juddering.
example_translate: Двигатель не запускается. / Мотор не заводится.
Он сел за руль и завел двигатель.
У этого двигателя только три движущиеся части.
На ремонт этого двигателя ушло несколько часов.
двигатель автомобиля работал на холостом ходу
Он легко обращается с любыми механизмами.
